name: market for bitumen seal | bitumen seal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1576/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'bitumen seal', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The product "bitumen seal" represents a bitumen sealing consisting of bitumen (major input in terms of mass), a fleece layer (glass fibre, polyester, glass etc.), limestone and schist meal, as well as sand and talcum. The product is applicable in the construction building sector. Bitumen sealing is used to protect the construction against water intrusion, mainly in flat roofed houses and in road construction work. The bitumen sealing types described in ecoinvent are V60, Alu80, VA4 and EP4 flam.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'bitumen seal',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'bitumen seal',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
